short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To create a React component with an input details.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is used to convert and create React component based on the type. It will reduces the manual work for converting the html to react component
